author: Peter Brandt@PeterLBrandt·22h
tweet_text: Best cash trade I ever saw when at CBOT. Cannot remember exactly year or levels (too lazy to look it up). Mid Aug & U/Z Corn was at big inversion due to short crop year. Cargill bot all the early GA/AL/MS/FL/LA harvest it could and silently railed it to Toledo and Chicago.

author: Yumi@samuraipips358·3 janv.
tweet_text:
What does it mean to ‘adapt to the market’?

Many people misunderstand what “adapting to the market” means.
Constantly changing strategies or systems every time the market moves contradicts consistency.
So what does it mean to correctly adapt to the market?
↓Thread 1/7

author: Peter Brandt@PeterLBrandt·22h
tweet_text: Right on Yumi. I do not trust traders who claim to constantly switch trading approaches to perfectly match new trading conditions. There are good times and bad times with all approaches.
